text: Ara tamra sange du’jana yubaka jele dhukechila. Tadera ekajana balale, ''ami dekhalama mada tairi karachi.’’ Ara an'yajana balale, ''ami dekhalama ami amara mathara upare ruti baye nicchi, ta theke pakhira khacche.’’''Amadera era tatparya bale da'o, amara niscaya'i tomake dekhachi bhalo-lokadera madhyekara.’’
